casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: A.B., J.B. No. 81P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 J. Lee Gilliam, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Blackmon, Erica. Kathleen Arundell Jackson, Attorney at Law, Christopher C. Peace, Attorney at Law, for Mecklenburg County YFS. Michael N. Tousey, Attorney at Law, for GAL.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of March 2016 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
